message.content: {"id": "18163", "title": "Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace", "description": "When using Ctrl+M (Add Import), nothing happens because of the trailing whitespace within the selection.", "OB": "When I select a portion of the code, including leading or trailing whitespace, and use Ctrl+M (Add Import), the action does not have any effect.", "EB": "After fixing the issue, when I select a portion of the code that includes leading or trailing whitespace and use Ctrl+M (Add Import), the action should add the necessary import statement to the code and not be affected by the whitespace.", "SR": "The Add Import functionality should ignore leading and trailing whitespace when it is selected and continue to work properly."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
